readable.title: 181157221_e12410ef0b
readable.content: A man and a woman walk their dogs on leashes . Dogs straining on leashes towards each other , as owners walk apart on grass . The two dogs are being pulled away by their owners . Two dogs on leashes straining toward each other while their owners walk away from each other . Two dogs try to reach each other as their human companions pull them in opposite directions by their leashes .
